data.text: @emirates What about US travelers that are fully vaccinated. Most location don’t have / provide a QR code. Do we need a PCR test then, PCR with QR code are expensive

@emirates emirates has been destroying dubai's reputation with its laid back attitude and indifference to the inconvenience caused to passengers.. whats more, the customer service team taken 38 days and no response yet @visitdubai

@Blessin75148897 @kaymillar24 @emirates Yes because it has all your details on too inc date and the vaccination you had. Print a copy off also though just incase any phone probs … and yes it contains the QR code also
@emirates Putin`s army is killing civilians and children! Stop working in Russia! #StopPutin
@emirates I am flying from dammam to Dubai to tomorrow morning.. thanks god No PCR is required for me .. however I need to take it for return back to Saudi
@emirates @emirates Hello people from UK is the NHS app prove of vaccine with the QR codes we show the check in please???
@kaymillar24 @Claresm86912360 @emirates Great thanks and also is the NHS app proof of vaccination certificate with the QR code please??
@normacolford @Shaydeiii @emirates I am the same.  Whole family are fully vaccinated but our state has no QR code, so it will cost $600 for the RT PCR test.  It stinks!

@emirates Refund my N887,245. You claimed my refund was approved on 23 Jan but I'm yet to get any refund. Lie from the pit of hell.
I've been sending several complaint and you claimed your refund team will attend to it within 5 days. It's about 2 months now, no response & no refund
